variable.comment: How much from a Pause keypress to another.
variable.name: PAUSE_MENU_KEY_PRESS_DELTA_TIME

variable.comment: Tick in which player paused the game.
variable.name: PausedAtTick

variable.comment: Used to sync correctly the timer.
variable.name: DeltaTime

sub-events.comment: Command Type: 0: Main Menu; 1: Player; 2: End Game Menu; 3: Pause Menu; 4: Tutorial opened.
Parametri: 0: Player Number; 1: Show Pause (0: No, 1: Yes).
Parametri: 0: Voce di menu da selezionare; 1: Player Number.
